Name: Cage of the Succubi
About the game: One day, as our unfortunate hero was walking home, a demon stopped him on the road. Without warning, she cast a spell on him, knocking him unconscious. When he awoke, he found himself in a mysterious castle. There, a maid explained to him that he was captured in order to serve as a demon's slave. Can our hero escape? Or is he doomed to serve for the rest of his life? Features: Dungeon crawling action RPG Explore randomized dungeons Gather materials and craft items Power up and try to escape the demon's castle
Meta Title: Cage of the Succubi: Dec 5, 2019, Ason and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Cage of the Succubi? Check out the release date (Dec 5, 2019), developer insights from Ason, and a complete game summary.
